languages.text: {n}С трудом поднявшись, Паскаль дрогнувшим голосом произносит:{/n} "Единица готова к служению. Помилуй меня, Омниссия".
{n}Pasqal forces himself upright and says in a faltering voice,{/n} "This unit is ready to serve. Omnissiah have mercy on me."
languages.original_text: {n}С трудом поднявшись, Паскаль дрогнувшим голосом произносит:{/n} "Единица готова к служению. Помилуй меня, Омниссия".

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルは無理やり体を起こし、たどたどしい声で言う。{/n}「このユニットは任務に就く準備が整っています。万機神よ、ご慈悲を…」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal forces himself upright and says in a faltering voice,{/n} "This unit is ready to serve. Omnissiah have mercy on me."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは無理やり体を起こし、たどたどしい声で言う。{/n}「このユニットは任務に就く準備が整っています。万機神よ、ご慈悲を…」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡强迫自己站了起来，以颤抖的声音开了口。{/n}“本单位已经做好了战斗准备，愿欧姆尼塞亚赐予我仁慈。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal forces himself upright and says in a faltering voice,{/n} "This unit is ready to serve. Omnissiah have mercy on me."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡强迫自己站了起来，以颤抖的声音开了口。{/n}“本单位已经做好了战斗准备，愿欧姆尼塞亚赐予我仁慈。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal se obliga a levantarse y dice con voz vacilante,{/n} «Esta unidad está lista para servir. Omnissiah, ten piedad de mí».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal forces himself upright and says in a faltering voice,{/n} "This unit is ready to serve. Omnissiah have mercy on me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal se obliga a levantarse y dice con voz vacilante,{/n} «Esta unidad está lista para servir. Omnissiah, ten piedad de mí».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal zwingt sich zu einer aufrechten Haltung und sagt mit wackliger Stimme:{/n} "Diese Einheit ist bereit zu dienen. Der Omnissiah habe Gnade mit mir."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal forces himself upright and says in a faltering voice,{/n} "This unit is ready to serve. Omnissiah have mercy on me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal zwingt sich zu einer aufrechten Haltung und sagt mit wackliger Stimme:{/n} "Diese Einheit ist bereit zu dienen. Der Omnissiah habe Gnade mit mir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal se force à se redresser.{/n} « Cette unité est prête à servir, {n}déclame-t-il sur un ton hésitant.{/n} Que l'Omnimessie ait pitié de moi. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal forces himself upright and says in a faltering voice,{/n} "This unit is ready to serve. Omnissiah have mercy on me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal se force à se redresser.{/n} « Cette unité est prête à servir, » {n}déclame-t-il sur un ton hésitant.{/n} Que l'Omnimessie ait pitié de moi. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Kendini dik durmaya zorlayan Pasqal, bocalayarak konuşuyor.{/n} "Bu birim hizmete hazırdır. Hermesih canımı bağışlasın."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal forces himself upright and says in a faltering voice,{/n} "This unit is ready to serve. Omnissiah have mercy on me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal kendini zorlaya zorlaya dik durup bocalayarak konuşuyor.{/n} "Bu birim hizmete hazırdır. Hermesih canımı bağışlasın."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
